resources.string: Alris is a next-gen AI chatbot powered by Google’s Gemini model, designed by Kunal, a B.Tech 2nd-year Electrical Engineering student at NIT Silchar. It delivers human-like conversations, adapting to your style, length, and language — making every interaction feel natural and intuitive. Alris stands at the forefront of the AI revolution, promoting innovation while encouraging responsible AI use. It’s fast, smart, and personalized — built for the future of conversation.
